title: QoL buff to Nasus' Theme (not his gameplay)
body:
I think his Q sound and visual effect should scale with stacks.

0-100 stacks- almost no sound
101-200 Current sound level
201-300 Bump up sound, add a particle to the hit
301-450 Louder, more particles
451+ I want the ground to be mashed under his target

Yes! Clarity!

Well, this would obviously take some coding work that might be more advanced then you think. 

The only time you ever see an "evolve over time" mechanic (note: not like Kha'zix or Viktor) is in the ultimate skins. Basically, what your asking for is almost the same thing that DJ Sona has, and I'm not sure Riot would want to do that for a champion and all of his skins. 

Don't get me wrong, though. It's an awesome idea.
Making a model bigger is FAR easier then making sounds more vibrant and intimidating. Also, DJ Sona does evolving music and sounds.

Yeah, but with that skin we're talking three entirely different models, sharply designed on different thematic grounds each tied to an entire musical piece composed for maximum synergy with the model. A little bit of bonus effort into particles and having a few extra, similar sound effects is nothing compared to that, it's a feature I wouldn't be at all surprised to see on a newer champion's basic abilities.
